title: High Noon Thresh Model
body:
Hey everyone,

So I absolutely love that Thresh is getting a new skin. The particles look great, the way he looks his sound , his abilities, all of it. I think Riot's done a really good job with the skin. However, there is just one slight thing that really confuses me. In the models of Thresh I've seen, his head just seems to be really far from his body and it just looks off. Anyway, just wondering if Riot's planning on fixing it.

[](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-03K41pG8Mj8/W3OQiVmQqaI/AAAAAAABFk4/ODA04kW40oUJGXIuLA4H_98F8YycbX2XwCLcBGAs/s1600/thresh.jpg)

[](https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-T6biSL5Htto/W3OQjMvszcI/AAAAAAABFlM/3ygE6S4ZW90XjQcpZLXcsr5PfLSNjEhswCLcBGAs/s1600/threshturn.jpg)
